thread.title: Afghanistan's first women studies program now in session
thread.title_full: Video: Afghanistan's first women studies program now in session | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Afghanistan's first women studies program now in session
text: Since the Taliban was ousted from power 14 years ago, Afghanistan's government has taken steps to improve the status of women, including in education. NewsHour's Megan Thompson reports.
